member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO structure contains information about a message recipient that is using key agreement key management.This structure is used with the structure.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: A structure that specifies the algorithm used for encryption.

For ECC recipients, the pszObjId member of the structure should be set to szOID_DH_SINGLE_PASS_STDDH_SHA1_KDF with the dwKeyChoice member of this CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO structure set to CMSG_KEY_AGREE_EPHEMERAL_KEY_CHOICE.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.pvKeyEncryptionAuxInfo
member.summary: This member is not currently used. It must be set to NULL.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.KeyWrapAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that specifies the algorithm used for key wrapping.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.pvKeyWrapAuxInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that specifies the key wrapping bit length. This member is only used if the KeyWrapAlgorithm member specifies an RC2 algorithm. If KeyWrapAlgorithm specifies an algorithm other than an RC2 algorithm, this member is not used and must be NULL.

summary.para: This member is not used and should be set to NULL.
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: A handle to a cryptographic service provider (CSP) obtained by using the function. This member is optional and can be NULL.This member's data type is HCRYPTPROV.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.dwKeySpec
member.summary: This member is not currently used.

summary.para: Indicates the type of key agreement. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Create a temporary public/private key pair to encrypt the content encryption key.
This value is not currently used.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pEphemeralAlgorithm
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that contains the ephemeral public key algorithm and parameters. This member is used when the dwKeyChoice member contains CMSG_KEY_AGREE_EPHEMERAL_KEY_CHOICE.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pSenderId
member.summary: A pointer to a structure. This member is used when the dwKeyChoice member contains CMSG_KEY_AGREE_STATIC_KEY_CHOICE. This member is not currently used.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.UserKeyingMaterial
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that contains user keying material (UKM) provided by the sender to ensure that a different key is generated each time the same two parties generate a pair-wise key. This member is optional and all members should be set to zero if not used.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.cRecipientEncryptedKeys
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgpRecipientEncryptedKeys array.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.rgpRecipientEncryptedKeys
member.summary: An array of structures, one for each recipient to receive this key agreement key. The cRecipientEncryptedKeys member contains the number of elements in this structure.
